product_name: REI Madrona Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: This street-smart jacket is perfect for travels where you need wet-weather protection. The REI Madrona z[plus-size jacket is fully seam sealed and blocks wind to 60 mph. Waterproof and breathable, the Madrona jacket offers 2-layer protection from the elements; brushed tricot/taffeta lining is soft and warm and slides easily over clothing. Weather-ready protection includes a zip-off adjustable hood and full-length front zipper with snap-close storm placket. Adjustable snap cuffs. 2 zippered handwarmer pockets with stormflaps. Interior pockets include a zip pocket with a headphone port, a stretch mesh drop-in pocket and a hidden zip security pocket along lower side seam. Classic fit provides comfort and ease.
short_description: This street-smart jacket is perfect for travels where you need wet-weather protection. The REI Madrona z[plus-size jacket is fully seam sealed and blocks wind to 60 mph.
